Prve informacije oko Pavkova: Nije prelom
Pauza ga sigurno čeka

07 Nov 2019

Imao je Totenhem prednost od tri gola i ishod je već bio odlučen. Taj poslednji gol za konačnih 4:0 već je bio previše, posebno zato što je Crvena zvezda tada igrala sa desetoricom na terenu, pošto je Milan Pavkov pri doskoku izvrnuo zglob i morao da napusti teren nakon što je šef struke Vladan Milojević već izvršio sve tri izmene.
Pavkov je potom odvezen sa terena na snimanje i rezultati pregleda bi trebalo da budu poznati u toku dana. Prve informacije nisu tragične, izgleda da nije u pitanju prelom zgloba desne noge.
Bolovanje svakako predstoji korpulentnom napadaču iz Begeča, samo nam ostaje da sačekamo izveštaj lekara i saznamo koliko će potrajati period oporavka. Izvesno je da će preskočiti prvenstveni sudar sa Javorom u nedelju.
(FOTO: Reuters)
text:
First information about Pavkov: Not a break
A break is certainly waiting for him

07 Nov 2019

Tottenham had a three-goal advantage and the outcome was already decided. That last goal for the final 4-0 was already too much, especially since Red Star then played with ten on the pitch, as Milan Pavkov turned his wrist on a drop and had to leave the field after the boss Vladan Milojevic had already done all three changes.
Pavkov was then taken from the field for filming and the results of the examination should be known throughout the day. The first information is not tragic, it does not seem to be a fracture of the wrist of the right leg.
Sick leave is certainly ahead of the corrupt attacker from Begec, we just have to wait for the doctor's report and find out how long the recovery period will take. He is certain to skip the championship clash with Javor on Sunday.
(PHOTO: Reuters)
